item.title: Ah nvm fixed. lock plox
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

my command handler… is busted…

i just made the new one for my V2,
but…

i get this error. i dont understand, becuase my handler for V1 works.

CommandHandler.java:24: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("test") && (p.playerRights >= 3)) ^ CommandHandler.java:24: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("test") && (p.playerRights >= 3)) ^ CommandHandler.java:24: illegal start of type if (command.startsWith("test") && (p.playerRights >= 3)) ^

it was just a test code =\

[code] if (command.startsWith(“test”) && (p.playerRights >= 3))
{
p.sendMessage(“weeee”);

		} [/code]

i dont under stand why its not working >.<

Read full topic
